==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Oguz:''' Hello, what can I help you with?
:{{DIcon}} And you are...
::'''Oguz:''' I'm with [[the Eremites]], hired by the [[Akademiya]] to be a guard here.
::'''Oguz:''' What's important is the duty of the Eremites, not who I am. We are the only authorized mercenary organization in the entire Sumeru.
::'''Oguz:''' Remember that so you won't get cheated by scammers.
::'''Oguz:''' If you need a competent, reliable bodyguard or watchman in Port Ormos, see our Captain [[Feroz]].
::'''Oguz:''' He's rather blunt, but will give you good people.
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Oguz:''' See you.
{{Dialogue End}}
